title: Paprika movie logo hybrid sans
content:
i saw a movie called paprika last night. a very trippy anime flick. refrigerators on parade, giant babies eating cities. and the scariest kimono-clad dolls ever. the title font is lovely. any ideas on what it is?

thanks!
author: kimsheblue

comments.content: I wish we were all lucky enough to see the film, but I think we'll need a sample in order to identify the type.

[Here it is.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021232/http:/www.impawards.com/2006/paprika_xlg.html) I've been wondering myself if it's familiar just because it looks like a cross between Helvetica Rounded and Dogma. :^/

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paprika_5019.jpg)
i think i remember this from the 90's. wasn't it t26? cursory search there turned up not much.
You found out what it is?
